name: PAT_EDU_POINT_LEARNER_DAT
description: This table extracts the related multiple response Most Recent Learner DAT (I PED 490) item.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the education record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MOST_RECENT_LEARNER_DAT
columns.description: This item stores the PED contact for the most recent learner documentation.
